abstract.para: The fish number, species, lengths, weights, sex, stomach, and maturity of fish captured in lake N2 during the summers of 1986-1989.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Lake N2 lies just north of Toolik Lake and to the west of Limno Lord Bay.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: Apr90 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: Julie Pallant DATE: 4Oct91

para.literalLayout: The various species of fish were removed from Lake N2 using conventional hook and line techniques. The only species caught was grayling. The lengths, and weight of each fish were recorded then the fish were tagged. Whether or not the stomach or otoliths were taken was noted also. (The fish's body parts were left intact unless the fish died or needed to be sacrificed for N15 analysis by George.)

Notes: The yellow tags in the "Recap #" column are from 1986 (I think), they are from the fish added in from Toolik Lake. The tags that aren't LTER tags are juvenile tags, which need to be tied to the fish's body by hand. LTER tags are much faster and easier to use.

Variable Variable descrip. Preces./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE Site of measurement y DATE Date DDMMMYY n FISH # Fish number n blank TAG # Tag number (if tagged) n blank RECAP # Tag number (if recaptured) n blank SIDE Which side of N2 was the n fish caught in - (control or fertilized)? SPECIES GR = grayling n TL total length mm n FL fork length mm n SL standard length mm n blank WT weight gm n STOM stomach taken (y/n) n OTO otolith taken (y/n) n SEX male or female n blank MATURE mature or immature (y/n) n blank COMMENTS notes about the data n blank (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
